Chris Cornell

Why? At least Chris Cornell’s lesser known solo projects sounded like Chris Cornell. No matter who he works with, Timbaland always sounds like Timbaland.

Pirate Radio

06 Mar 2009

Pirate Radio is a problem for folks over in the UK. And it’s time to crack down. Pirate radio signals can override existing radio stations and emergency signals.

The one line that amused me the most reminded me of a drug deal:

Five people were arrested and officers seized thousands of pounds worth of broadcasting and musical equipment.

What does this say?

  1. Radio is still alive and making money, which is why Pirate Radio wants in the game
  2. Commercial Radio isn’t doing something…

Update: Sept 2015, Updated Image
